original: ANDERSSON, Fritz Gustaf Adolf, Brukskamrer, Surahammar, f Sthlm 22/5 94 av byggm A A o h h Thérese, gm Ingeborg Lindqvist. Allm lärov, hdlsinst. Anst byggn.-kont 13—14, Sthlm o Uppsala l rev.byrå 14— 16, Surahammars Br AB sed. 16, kamr o kont.-ch där. Ag Hällsjö gård Fläckebo s :n, deläg fastigh.frn Brunfisken 19 o Eldaren. Kronoomb i tax.nmd, led fastigh- o bol.tax.nmd, komm.nmd, familjebidr.nmd, byggn.nmd. Styr.led Surah.kretsen av SvRK, Uplands Ensk bks Surah.kont, Skogslunds egnahemsfrn upa, Fastigh.frn Brunfisken 19, rev Västm l brand-stodsbol. Surah skyttefrns ftJM; Frimurare. Hobbies: Trädgårdsskötsel, skogsskötsel, filateli. °ANDERSSON, Carl Georgr, Direktör, Vingåker, f Gryt, Sörml l, 19/7 89, gm Gerda Olsson. Sörml l fhsk o lantm.sk 10—12, hdls-kurs 13. Kont.ch i spannmålsfma 18—21, vkst dir Vingåkers Kvarn o Hdls AB fr start 21, d:o AB Vingåkers Spisbrödsfabr sed. 29, nu disp o vkst dir i sistnämnda AB i vilk Vingåkers Kvarn & Hdls AB uppgick 33. Styr.led Sörmlbkns avd.kont. °ANDERSSON, George, Disponent, Kungsör, f Jäders s:n, Sörml, 19/9 93 av sågvksäg A A o h h. Eft slut sk.gång anst fad fma Axel Anderssons sågvksrör Kungsör, disp ds eftr Kungsörs Träind Axel Andersson & Co sed. 30, vkst dir AB Köpings Byggnadsvaror Köping, ag fma George Andersson Kungsör. Köpingsflm, fd ordf där, fd ordf byggn.ktén o badhusstyr; ordf hamnstyr, led tax.nmd. V. ordf Kungsörs skyttefrn; Odd Fellow, en av stift av Knutsgillet, led orden 14 M 99. °ANDERSSON, Gunnar, Köpman. Lindesberg, f Börstig, Skarab l, 17/12 92. Start tills m brod chark.fma Bröderna Andersson Säffle 15, etabl chark.fma Gunnar Andersson Lin-desbg 23. Styr.led Lindesbgs Köpmfrn, kass Lindesbgs Fabr- o Hantv.frn. °ANDERSSON, Axel Gunnar, Köpman, Örebro, f Norrk 1/10 90 av K G A o h h, f Öhrn, gm Ester Svensson. Efter avsl skolgång anst h grossh John Persson, Norrk, 12—23. Res o rep f AB A F Carlssons Skofabrik, Vänbg, 34, sedermera eget företag A Gunnar Andersson, specialfma i mäter f skofabr, Örebro. Styr.led Norrk Hdlsres.frn, stift av S I B, Norrk, ordf Idrottskl Sleipner 11—23, nu hdrsled där, medl Odd Fellow.
translated:
ANDERSSON, Fritz Gustaf Adolf, Clerk, Surahammar, born in Stockholm on May 22, 1894, son of builder A A and Thérese, married to Ingeborg Lindqvist. Completed general education, attended commercial institute. Employed at building office from 1913 to 1914 in Stockholm and Uppsala, at a tax office from 1914 to 1916, and at Surahammars Ironworks AB since 1916, where he was a clerk and head of the office. Partial owner of the property Från Brunfisken 19 and Eldaren. Member of the Kronoomb in the tax board, board member of real estate and company tax boards, municipal board, family benefits board, and building board. Board member of the Surah district of the Swedish Red Cross, Uplands Ensk bank Surah office, Skogslunds private property association, the property Från Brunfisken 19, and the Västmanland fire insurance company. Member of the Surah shooting club; Freemason. Hobbies: Gardening, forestry, philately.

ANDERSSON, Carl George, Director, Vingåker, born in Gryt, Södermanland on July 19, 1889, married to Gerda Olsson. Attended Södermanland vocational school and agricultural school from 1910 to 1912, and a commercial course in 1913. Head clerk at a grain company from 1918 to 1921, then became the managing director of Vingåkers Kvarn and Trade AB since its establishment in 1921, and also of AB Vingåkers Spisbrödsfabrik since 1929, where Vingåkers Kvarn & Trade AB merged in 1933. Board member of the Södermanland bank's local branch.

ANDERSSON, George, Manager, Kungsör, born in Jäders parish, Södermanland, on September 19, 1893, son of sawmill owner A A and h h. Employed at his father's sawmill company Axel Anderssons sågvirkesrör in Kungsör, then became the manager of Kungsörs Träindustri Axel Andersson & Co since 1930, and the managing director of AB Köpings Byggnadsvaror Köping. Owner of the company George Andersson Kungsör. Former chairman of the Köpingsflm, former chairman of the building committee and bathing house management board; chairman of the harbor board, member of the tax board. Vice chairman of Kungsörs shooting club; member of Odd Fellow, one of the founders of Knutsgillet, and a member of the order since 1914.

ANDERSSON, Gunnar, Merchant, Lindesberg, born in Börstig, Skaraborg county, on December 17, 1892. Established the butcher and deli company Bröderna Andersson Säffle in 1915, and later the butcher company Gunnar Andersson Lindesberg in 1923. Board member of Lindesbergs Köpmansförening and treasurer of Lindesbergs Fabriks- och Hantverksförening.

ANDERSSON, Axel Gunnar, Merchant, Örebro, born in Norrköping on October 1, 1890, son of K G A and h h, née Öhrn, married to Ester Svensson. After completing school, employed at the wholesale company John Persson, Norrköping, from 1912 to 1923. Traveled and represented AB A F Carlssons Skofabrik, Vänberg, in 1934, then established his own company, A Gunnar Andersson, specializing in measuring devices for shoe factories, in Örebro. Board member of Norrköping's Trade Travelers' Association, member of the S I B foundation, former chairman of the sports club Sleipner from 1911 to 1923, currently an honorary member, member of Odd Fellow.

memberOf.name: Surah District of the Swedish Red Cross

career.occupational_title: Head Clerk at a Grain Company
